scripts.build-win: ng build --configuration production --aot --base-href ./ && electron-packager . demo-app --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=./dist/angular-build/assets/icons8-connect-256.ico --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-build --version-string.CompanyName=SciTechEnthusiast --version-string.FileDescription=SciTechEnthusiast --version-string.ProductName="Demo Angular Electron app"
scripts.build-winux: ng build --configuration production --aot --base-href ./ && electron-packager . demo-app --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=./dist/angular-build/assets/icons8-connect-256.ico --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-build --version-string.CompanyName=SciTechEnthusiast --version-string.FileDescription=SciTechEnthusiast --version-string.ProductName="Demo Angular Electron app" && electron-packager . demo-app --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=./dist/angular-build/assets/icons8-connect-256.png --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-build
